tr.td: Standard single cycle binary image erosion.
Standard single cycle binary image dilation. When used in conjunction with erosion can be used to remove holes inside binary objects.
Removes any object that touches the boundary of the image.

Removes pixel connected objects from the binary image that are smaller than a user selected threshold. User can choose from the set: {‘10’,‘20’,‘30’,‘40’,‘50’,‘100’,‘150’,‘200’,‘250’,‘300’,‘350’,‘400’,‘450’,‘500’} Objects smaller than the selected threshold will be removed from the image
Removes objects from the image that the user selects by clicking on them.
Counts the nuclei in the image, assuming each cell has one nucleus.
